original_title: In the Classroom with David Robinson
overview: This program examines numerous issues which face today's teenagers daily. Robinson, a former NBA basketball player and MVP, speaks candidly about his experiences, career and family and what has influenced him to be the person he is today. He talks about the pressures of fitting in, making the right choices, organizing priorities, dealing with changes and achieving success.
tagline: Love Hate Leadership Temptation Balance Faith Success
title: In the Classroom with David Robinson
